issue.title: [C++] Allow specifying default metadata for new S3 files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12937](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12937). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The S3 filesystem recognizes some metadata keys with `OpenOutputStream`, such as `Content-Language` or `ACL` (see ARROW-12719). It would be useful, especially for ACLs, to be able to set default values at the filesystem level itself.
